comments.author: meikowski07@gmail.com
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/535.2 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/15.0.874.106 Safari/535.2

Steps to reproduce:

Hi there!

My problem is:

I have an iframe with the navigation on the left and right side of the iframe. There are links within the navigation which should be opened in the iframe with an anchor on the top. But when somebody click on the link the anchor does not work.

 http://www.mypage.com#oben target="iframename"

Does Firefox support this? Is there an workaround?
comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/535.2 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/15.0.874.106 Safari/535.2

Does Firefox support this? Is there an workaround?
